byline.contributor: Jeffrey Hutton reported from Jakarta, and Gerry Mullany from Hong Kong. Brett Cole contributed reporting from Sydney, and Rusmadi Muhammad from Jakarta.

docs.snippet: Former Nigerian rulers have banded together to sing a hymn for peace in their troubled nation, with some acknowledging they had a role in creating the "mess." Their video wish for 2017 is getting scornful comments from many on social media....
